articles.title: Space station timelapse captures stunning 'orbital sunrise' over Earth - BBC.com
articles.description: The footage - captured by a Nasa astronaut - shows the skies brighten as the International Space Station passes over Europe.
articles.content:
Stunning timelapse footage taken aboard the International Space Station shows the skies over Earth being lit up by an approaching sunrise.
Nasa said the footage of the "orbital sunrise" - which is w… [+161 chars]
